se.nicklasgavelin.log
Class Logging

java.lang.Object
  se.nicklasgavelin.log.Logging

public class Logging
extends java.lang.Object

Manages the logging of the application. If the log4j logging class can't be found the logging will be disabled by default. Otherwise the logging will follow the settings in the Configuration class

Version:
2.1 Notice: Based on the debug logger in Bluecove
Author:
Nicklas Gavelin, nicklas.gavelin@gmail.com, Lule√• University of Technology

Nested Class Summary
static class Logging.Level
          Different debug levels, mirrors that of log4j levels
